Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Texas in 1982...
Injured on 8/20/1982 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from Texas to St. Louis on 6/23/1985 (Going to STL: P D. Cone, P M. Williams. Going to TEX: P D. Eckersley)...
Earned first career win on 4/16/1988...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Struck out 17 batters against Pittsburgh on 4/23/1994...
Struck out 16 batters against Pittsburgh on 6/29/1994...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1994, going 6-0, 1.46...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 4/26/1996...
Struck out 15 batters against Houston on 7/29/1996...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 5/5/1997...
Struck out 16 batters against Houston on 8/16/1997...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1997, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
